content:
You're right—**Tags should be required everywhere** for consistency and proper indexing across all tables. Since **Master Tags Database** will control all tags, this ensures structured categorization and streamlined filtering.

### **Updated Actions:**
✅ **Make Tags Required in AI Influencers & Thought Leaders.**  
✅ **Ensure Tags logic aligns across PKD, Knowledge Vault, and other related tables.**  
✅ **Update Canvas to reflect this decision.**  
✅ **Document Master Tags as the single source of truth for categorization.**  

I'll now update the **Notion DB Canvas** to reflect this across all relevant tables. Then we can proceed to sample data for AI Influencers. 🚀
